title: [Bug]: Unable to access devices since latest update
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

Every since the latest update, I cannot access my microphonoe or my webcam anymore from temas. It just lists no devices being available. If I run from the cmd, I get 

```
11:19:43.719 › DENIED setPermissionCheckHandler check media requested by https://teams.microsoftonline.cn/v2 with origin https://teams.microsoftonline.cn/
11:19:43.719 › DENIED setPermissionCheckHandler check media requested by https://teams.microsoftonline.cn/v2 with origin https://teams.microsoftonline.cn/
11:19:43.719 › DENIED setPermissionCheckHandler check geolocation requested by https://teams.microsoftonline.cn/v2 with origin https://teams.microsoftonline.cn/
11:19:46.297 › DENIED setPermissionCheckHandler check media requested by https://teams.microsoftonline.cn/v2 with origin https://teams.microsoftonline.cn/
11:19:46.298 › DENIED setPermissionCheckHandler check media requested by https://teams.microsoftonline.cn/v2 with origin https://teams.microsoftonline.cn/
11:19:46.298 › DENIED setPermissionCheckHandler check geolocation requested by https://teams.microsoftonline.cn/v2 with origin https://teams.microsoftonline.cn/
11:19:46.349 › GetSystemIdleState => IdleTimeout: 300s, IdleTimeoutPollInterval: 10s, ActiveCheckPollInterval: 2s, IdleTime: 0s, IdleState: 'active'
11:19:46.449 › Badge count set to '0'
```

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.13.1
